Ever wondered what to do with your old clothes?

Pantaloons in association with Goonj brings you "Joy Exchange" an initiative to get your old clothes to someone who will put it to better use. 

To show your support, all you need to do is drop them at the nearest Pantaloons Store and give your old clothes a new life.

It's now official. Men love to shop till they drop!

With the Pantaloon's 'What Men Desire' shopping festival, it is now time to make the fairer sex wait for hours while you do your shopping. Check out exciting offers on our various labels, styles and categories and discover what it is like to be on a real shopping spree. 

So go ahead men, it's your turn to shop till you drop.

We have a special guest joining us today!! Jawed Habib Hair Expert & fashion hair stylist will be here today from 2 PM to 3 PM to bust those common hair myths and spill the secrets on maintaining those lovely locks! He will answer any questions you've got on Pantaloons Wall !! So keep those questions ready :)
